markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Saurian Worldwatcher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=978)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The longest-lived saurians favor introspection and take the long view of things—though this thoughtfulness should not be mistaken for weakness. Other saurians defer to worldwatchers' experience.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 40

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Saurian_SaurianWorldwatcher.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 18">[Saurian Worldwatcher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=978)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Dinosaur" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=45" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 81</row>

**Perception** +34; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +32, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +32, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +34, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +35, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +34

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +9

**Con** +6

**Int** +5

**Wis** +8

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
[javelins](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (2), _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [naginata](/Weapons.aspx?ID=98)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 43 

**Fort** +30 

**Ref** +33 

**Will** +32 

</row>

**HP** 330

**Resistances**
fire 15

**Raptor Jaw Disarm** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Frequency** once per round; **Trigger** A creature makes a melee Strike against the worldwatcher but misses; **Effect** The worldwatcher breaks the triggering creature's limb or weapon. If the triggering Strike was an unarmed attack, the triggering creature takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and becomes [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) until the limb is reset (an Interact action with the [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) trait). If the triggering Strike was a weapon Strike, the weapon takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_naginata_ +35 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 3d8+19 slashing plus stunning blow

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +33 ([deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+17 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d10+19 bludgeoning plus stunning blow

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 3d6+19 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +35 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+19 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 40
- **2nd**
[Animal Messenger](/Spells.aspx?ID=11)
- **3rd**
[Animal Vision](/Spells.aspx?ID=12) (at will; dinosaurs only)
- **4th**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)
- **9th**
[Fiery Body](/Spells.aspx?ID=115), [Summon Animal](/Spells.aspx?ID=316) (dinosaur only), [Volcanic Eruption](/Spells.aspx?ID=360)
- **Constant (2nd)**
[Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293)

**Boneshaking Roar** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) The saurian worldwatcher bellows, evoking the power of the primordial world. Non-[dinosaur](/Traits.aspx?ID=45) creatures within 30 feet take 10d6 sonic damage (DC 38 basic Fortitude save). On a failed save, a creature is also [slowed 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 round (stunned 1d4 on a critical failure). The saurian can't use Boneshaking Roar again for 1d4 rounds.

**Stunning Blow**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93)) Whenever the worldwatcher hits a creature with their fist or naginata Strike, that creature must succeed at a DC 39 Fortitude save or be [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) (stunned 3 on a critical hit).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-204" />
name: Saurian Worldwatcher
